STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_007_chunk4
证据片段: Anodizing a metallographically prepared sample of a zirconium alloy in a phosphoric acid solution results in color contrast between retained intermetallic compounds and the matrix.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_007_chunk4
证据片段: A color contrast is also observed between various types of intermetallic compounds by the nature of their different anodizing characteristics.

证据片段: A technique for heat tinting metallographic samples of Zircaloy-2 and Zircaloy-4 to show alloy microsegregation is also described.
